thread.title: Airports: Will the Government please stop talking and just start building
thread.title_full: Airports: Will the Government please stop talking and just start building

author: Allister Heath
title: Airports: Will the Government please stop talking and just start building
text: Transport Airports: Will the Government please stop talking and just start building We have been faffing around for decades while continental rivals built new air capacity. Now is the time to put up or become a global laughing stock Heathrow Hub suggests aircraft could land on the westerly part of the extended runway during unsociable hours to reduce disruption for residents Photo: Reuters By Allister Heath
